attributes.action: immediately announce that it could not have been the intention of the people who drew up the 1689 Bill of Rights to put MPs who commit the criminal act of theft above the law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It must be that those who write our laws are subject to them.  If these four alleged thieves are allowed to get away with this then we MUST have riots on the streets and public executions of elected MPs currently occupying seats in the House of Commons - just as they would happen in any other Islamic State.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
